faq.question: What types of financial reports does it support?
faq.answer: All formats: 10-K, 10-Q, 8-K, earnings presentations, annual reports, investor presentations, and analyst calls transcripts.

faq.question: Can it extract specific financial metrics?
faq.answer: Yes! Revenue, net income, EPS, EBITDA, margins, cash flow, debt levels, and custom metrics specific to each industry.

faq.question: Does it work for international companies?
faq.answer: Yes! We support financial reports from companies worldwide in multiple languages and accounting standards (GAAP, IFRS).

faq.question: How accurate is the metric extraction?
faq.answer: Our AI achieves 98%+ accuracy on standard financial metrics. Always verify critical numbers for investment decisions.

faq.question: Can I compare metrics across multiple reports?
faq.answer: Pro and Team plans support batch processing and comparative analysis across multiple periods and companies.
